pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, June 28, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Osaka, Japan

9:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Prime Minister of Vietnam Nguyễn Xuân Phúc.

International Exhibition Center

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with European partners: President of the European Council Donald Tusk, President of the European Commission Jean-Claude Juncker, Chancellor of Germany Angela Merkel, Prime Minister of the United Kingdom Theresa May, President of France Emmanuel Macron, Prime Minister of the Netherlands Mark Rutte, Prime Minister of Spain Pedro Sánchez, and Prime Minister of Italy Giuseppe Conte.

International Exhibition Center

Note for media:

  • Official photographers only

11:10 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the welcome ceremony held by the Prime Minister of Japan Shinzo Abe.

Leaders’ Area, Ground Floor
International Exhibition Center

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

11:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G20 family photo. 

Leaders’ Area, Ground Floor
International Exhibition Center

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

12:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G20 Working Luncheon, Working Session I, hosted by the Prime Minister of Japan, Shinzo Abe.

Plenary Room, Ground Floor
International Exhibition Center

Note for media:

  • Pooled and host broadcast coverage of the opening remarks

2:55 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G20 Working Session II.

Closed to media.

6:15 p.m. The Prime Minister and Sophie Grégoire Trudeau will arrive at the Osaka Geihinkan.

Osaka Geihinkan

Note for media:

  • Official photographers and host broadcast coverage only

6:45 p.m. The Prime Minister and Sophie Grégoire Trudeau will participate in the G20 family photo with partners.

Garden
Osaka Geihinkan

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

6:55 p.m. The Prime Minister and Sophie Grégoire Trudeau will attend a cultural performance.

Garden
Osaka Geihinkan

Note for media:

  • Host broadcast coverage only

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and Sophie Grégoire Trudeau will attend the G20 Leaders’ Dinner held by the Prime Minister of Japan, Shinzo Abe.

Osaka Geihinkan

Note for media:

  • Host broadcast coverage only
